website_summaries.verdict: Offers eight massage motors installed to work your whole body over nine different massage modes.
pros: A full 360-degree swivel chair that includes a heat treatment area for the lower back
You have the option to disconnect the matching ottoman when it's not in use

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair vibrator and heater works well
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product and works extremely well. I'm 6 foot 200 pounds and have no problem. And it had plenty of cushion.But the Scotchgard they used in it gave me bad headaches so I return the chair. I'm not sure if anyone else has had that problem. If it would not have been that problem I would have kept the chair. I let it air out for a week thinking it would be okay and threw the Box away. Remember must return Amazon products in a box. Keep the box as long as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Mark DeWayne

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric color is a dark brown not the medium brown shown on the site. Chair is not as comfortable as I expected; it needs more padding over the massage elements. Assembly process is challenging; instructions are in not easy to locate. We found them when putting together the footstool, which was the last piece we put together. It was purchased for Christmas. I have used it for 3 months and then it broke. I am disappointed in the quality of this chair.
customer_reviews.author: LRJ

customer_reviews.title: that was better quality. I wanted a chair that was more ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband got a different model, that was better quality. I wanted a chair that was more "momma bear" size. I like the microfiber and the massage features, although, it would be nice to be able to preset your favorite mode. The biggest disappointment was the way it reclines. It is kind of sticky, and you have to go back and forth a bit to get it how you want it. It is not as comfortable as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Dana K Bressette

customer_reviews.title: The chair was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: The chair was easy to put together. It took more time to unwrap the packaging. I knew the massage modes just vibrated and that works for me. I am 5'9" tall and though the back could be longer, I can adjust the pillow and it is perfect. My cat and I enjoy the fact that the ottoman heats up as well. It is not thick enough for my cat to perch on the back of the chair but I am okay with that. I would recommend this to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this recliner for my rv and after using it for a month or so I have to say its worn out already. I'll admit I've used it a good bit but now there is a "hole" where your behind sets. I'd send it back if I had kept the box but in a rv you do not have the room for saving such things. It might be ok just for an occasional set but it will not hold up for moderate use.
customer_reviews.author: John Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: So far it's great
customer_reviews.text: It's not too difficult to put together. It's foam with a micro fiber outside. As for it's sturdiness, time will tell, definitely not for small kids or pets. The massage feature is very nice, and the intensity is perfect. It's not too hard, but you can really feel the mechanisms moving. It shakes the floor a bit, and makes noise, but neither bothered us when we used it. All in all, for the price it's very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Restorative value; mild rumble, with or without heat. Completely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Truly great value. My kitty Arlo and I are relaxing in one of the two we got. I have spine and hip issues. I can't speak for Arlo. Superb bargain. I think the price might have increased since we got ours. My husband and I love these chairs. They can be set at a very low rumble, with or without heat, but they are very meditative and soothing to crunchy old bones and weary minds. Completely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robin McGary

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, comfortable, and fun
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed this chair for years, now. The vibrator is mild but effective. The Price is great, the fabric has stood up well and the cushioning is strong. The chair is secure and is not falling apart in any way. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tim A. Denardo

customer_reviews.title: Made in China. Need I say more?
customer_reviews.text: It works. Finally. Needed a new control which Customer Service gets 5 stars for. Other than that the chair is a little uncomfortable and the "massage" is nothing more than vibration pads just under the upholstery. It only gets 2 stars because it is poorly constructed and it does not recline or swivel easily. It makes clicking noise as you try to recline or sit up because the mechanism does not slide easily. Tried waxing the glide rods but did not improve this. It is products like these that make one ask "why is everything made in China?" Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hedonikos

customer_reviews.title: Comfey and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for mom...very easy to put together, great price for what we got. Easy to clean. The massage works just perfect for Mom's leg and back pain the heat is also a great feature. We are very pleased with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: This chair is not intended for all day use. This far after only 4 mos is it loose where the seat meets the base. The cushions are now flat and it now requires a pillow on the back and the seat. Save your money and biy a real chair
customer_reviews.author: Vicky V.

customer_reviews.title: Assy. and Performance of the Chair is 4.5 Stars  Thank You
customer_reviews.text: The Chair Gave Me a little trouble with the Aligning and bolting of the Left Arm Assy. to the rest of the Main Base Assy. Other than that 1 Problem the Rest of the Assy. Went Very Well. As to the Performance and Comfort of the Chair, It has ben a Dream! Thank You Very Much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justmom

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable chair that does better than advertised !
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chair!!! It was easy to assemble, all parts were in fantastic condition. I love the massage options and the time settings. It also has the perfect heat in the lumbar. Very comforatble!
customer_reviews.author: David Trammel

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Great chair. Took a foldout sofa out of my rv. These fit better and more comfortable. I read the reviews before ordering. The instructions are vague as some said but no problem putting it together. Some reviews said they had to keep tightening the bolts over a period of time, they now come with lock tite on the bolts. I am six ft, 200 lbs, it fits fine. The fiber fabric is better than the leather to me because I get tired of slipping out of the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: prae35

customer_reviews.title: Good enough we bought a second one.
customer_reviews.text: We now have 2 of these chairs in our home, both purchased as gifts for my wife. (She enjoyed the first one so much, she requested a second one for our bedroom.) This is not a luxurious item, but the vibrations are enough to help relax a person.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hall

customer_reviews.title: it looks good in the picture and once it arrived it looked ...
customer_reviews.text: it looks good in the picture and once it arrived it looked ok. bought it for my wife to help with back pains. I have not even sit in it but she says that the chair is not comfortable. if it had the rocker action along with the swivel base might make some difference. massage with heat only gets lukewarm. other than that, I would have saved that money and purchased something else
customer_reviews.author: cd min

customer_reviews.title: I hate it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Too big to package and send back, but this chair slightly VIBRATES. I hate it! I know it is guranteed but I am an elderly lady living alone, and had to pay someone to put together and which took about 3 hours!!!!! And, had to stop to get a SCREW MISSING.....do not waste your money, I'll be sitting in this the rest of my life....it is NOT A MASSAGER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beanstalkmall

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For such a lightweight, low cost chair I was surprised how well made it is and how nice the fabric is. As to comfort, well if you're a big guy like me, sitting in the chair for any length of time the armrests will start to dig into your legs and get a bit uncomfortable. It also sits a little lower to the ground than I would prefer. My wife and kids, however, love the chair and think it is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DarkStreak

customer_reviews.title: I've had this less than a month, and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this about a month, and the only massager still working is in the seat cushion... and the heat doesn't turn off... and it's lumpy. Avoid! Edit Massager now doesn't work at all, and had a strong burning smell when it stopped... at least the chair didn't catch on fire! Comfort Products will not provide a refund, only a replacement, which I obviously don't want. They referred me to Amazon for a refund, but since their 30-day window has passed, I'm stuck with a giant paperweight. Once again, avoid this chair and seller!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gresham

customer_reviews.title: Nice Comfortable Chair, Not so Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my mother and she enjoys the massage, although it is really a vibration. This chair is rather small and narrow so overweight and tall people might not be comfortable. My mom said that the chair is comfortable and she often falls to sleep in it. I had a hard time putting the chair together with help because the screws did not fit correctly and the instructions were not clear. I can't truly say that I would recommend this chair because of the difficulty I had putting the chair together.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the heat in the lower back area, although it is limited to an area maybe 5" by 5." The massage has many vibration options, both in speed and areas selected. We're not talking deep tissue here, but it is soothing. I like the wood and construction quality. Reclines easily and great for naps :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Product was received with box intact and no damage obvious to parts until we started to attach arms right back screw holes did not line up by at least a 1/4 of an inch. when attempting to screw in the four bolts on the underside of of foot rest only two tightened to others just continued spinning. Packaging was broken down and removed to trash so we were unable to return. Also found a blemish in the finish photo included
customer_reviews.author: Robin Kline

customer_reviews.title: but the padding has worn quite thin and it is no longer comfortable. The back was a little too short for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for a couple of years now and it still works, but the padding has worn quite thin and it is no longer comfortable. The back was a little too short for me so I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: A.e.U.

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: does the job, easy to put together, took about a 1/2 hour for chair and ottoman, took 1 hour to figure out how to get the arms on, comfortable but firm material a little flimsy, great directions except for arms and wiring, for the price real nice, most of the negative reviews seem to have been addressed and the seller seems very easy to deal with
customer_reviews.author: fancy one

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this purchase! It was easy to put together and fits my 5'2" frame almost perfectly. It is not bulky and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable chair and easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable chair and easy to keep clean. The massage unit works very well and we use it often. The swivel feature makes getting out of the chair very handy.
customer_reviews.author: willieD

customer_reviews.title: Everything assembled easily and worked perfectly out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit the quality of this chair was more than I expected for the cost. Everything assembled easily and worked perfectly out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice in RV
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. All controls worked but to be honest, probably won't use the ottoman vibrator to much. Recliner was comfortable to sit in and test. The real test will start in Jan 2015 when we travel in our RV. Bought it for the trailer. Fits nicely and does not take up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Raptor Pack RVing

customer_reviews.title: I wasted my money on this purchase
customer_reviews.text: After almost light daily use this chair hasn't lasted a year. It is so uncomfortable and the cushions have gone totally flat. Not matter how tight I tighten the bolts they always come undone. I wasted my money on this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Erin Sartain

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: The chair comfy and cozy, the massage action is not a replacement for hands, but ok. The ability to change the intensity is nice. The heating function...not so much. It deserves a negative star. It gets slightly warm. Overall, its an ok purchase because of the look and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Holman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the heat...very comfortable. HOWEVER the fabric stinks...very toxic. My tongue is numb...
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Worse purchase!
customer_reviews.text: When it came out of the box my first thought was to send it back and I sure wish I would have. As another person commented it is like sitting in a wood chair with minimal padding which is stiff at that. Certainly not worth the money spent. And it is surprising there are positive reviews. You need to be a relatively small boned person or you will not fit in it. And not big on comfort.
customer_reviews.author: smb

customer_reviews.title: False Description
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as a massage chair. I only vibrates do you really think people are so stupid to not know the difference ? Would it not be better to tell the truth up front instead of making a customer mad and having to go through the hassle of a return ?
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: good thing it fit my wife
customer_reviews.text: This chair worked as stated; good thing it fit my wife . Grand kids love it. It does relax you, not really big enough for 6 ft,230 lb man. Basically you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Buckskin

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Chair
customer_reviews.text: Love the chair. Its sleek design works out well in the toy hauler ( not bulky), it was easy to put together and the leisure part is great, it has several different options. Good quality. The worst thing about this chair you have to get up from it eventually.
customer_reviews.author: clark

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value even at this price point
customer_reviews.text: Not stable, obnoxiously loud while reclining, generally quite uncomfortable... the only thing holding me back from returning immediately is the thought of unscrewing everything and trying to fit it all back in the box
customer_reviews.author: Emma Paluchniak

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I never thought this would take the place of my old LazyBoy recliner, but it has. I had to make sure the stool was scooted close enough that my knees didn't hyperextend, but this is lightweight and easy but sturdy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs
customer_reviews.text: We bought two. We had a small issue putting one together. They perfectly though. They are a little on the low side. If you have knee issues it could be a problem getting up. Would give 5 stars if higher chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: not enough padding where it is needed most. it flattened out after only one week. costing me more money to replace the foam.luckily this can done. otherwise good chair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy at first..
customer_reviews.text: Started squeaking in 2 weeks. Lumbar support wore out in a month. I am constantly tightening bolts and screws on chair. Massage and heat function are good so far.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: I tried it and im good with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. He loves it! The vibrating noise i guess didnt matter. I tried it and im good with it. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie Lamug

customer_reviews.title: Was packaged very well and moderately easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife and she loves it. Was packaged very well and moderately easy to assemble. Can't get her out of it but the vibeation may have something to do with it. lol
customer_reviews.author: Larry Steckman

customer_reviews.title: It's a little on the small side
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair - with all the massage equiptment it is not as plush as I expected, but it's okay. It is a little in the small side so beware.
customer_reviews.author: RickB

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Works OK, not as comfortable as I thought it would be but not bad for the price. The massage parts work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: RayN

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helps with the bad back and the price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: John Davis & Linda Cameron-Davis

customer_reviews.title: too low to the floor
customer_reviews.text: Could have more padding. This chair was such a disappointment. I brought the chair because I suffer from joint issues. Because the chair is so low, if I get in it, I can't get out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Roselle Marshall

customer_reviews.title: old women to put together but once done it is comfortable and the massage and heat portion is very nice
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult for an 80 yr, old women to put together but once done it is comfortable and the massage and heat portion is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Van Meter

customer_reviews.title: looks nice and works well.
customer_reviews.text: we like it for the price we paid, bought at open box pricing. can't find the directions for the remote.........
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: Heated Massage Chair
customer_reviews.text: The heat feels good on my lower back. The chair looks good and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: i do not like how you manually have to get up and recline ...
customer_reviews.text: the massager works well. i do not like how you manually have to get up and recline it. every now and then you have to retighten the screws. the chair is not worth 270$, i would pay $200 for it.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Vande Hey

customer_reviews.title: This item is liked because it serves two purposes
customer_reviews.text: This item is liked because it serves two purposes, it works as a computer chair and also an accent chair for my living room. And who can beat the heat and massage.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: After a quick review of this item I decided to return. Quality was not good. I would be lucky if it held up for just a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Donners

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not really a great quality chair, does not really help the back.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little on the light side. Don't know how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Brown

customer_reviews.title: This is a piece of crap!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of crap!!!!! It has already broken in under 3 months. I am the only one who uses it and I only weigh 140 pounds. It is hard, I had to put a pillow on it to give it some cushion. CRAP CRAP CRAP CRAP
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: screws always coming loss
customer_reviews.text: screw are always coming loss--has a odor to the facboric==would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: jackie dooley

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy chair for the hubby.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this instead of a massage chair pad (only cost a bit more) and we were all pleasantly surprised. Can't beat the chair for the price and the massage and heat work great. Very happy so far (had it for 2 months) and he sits in it all the time. Great chair for watching movies and getting a heated massage. :)
customer_reviews.author: T. Standley

customer_reviews.title: Ordered another!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered another one! I am getting rid of my cheap rocker glider. These chairs look good, are comfortable, and function well. This is a good price.
customer_reviews.author: JAY DAWGE

customer_reviews.title: Totally unsatisfied with the quality of this chair.. ...
customer_reviews.text: Totally unsatisfied with the quality of this chair...Chair came apart while sitting in it...Could have been hurt...Returned chair in less than two weeks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for the money. Hubby spends lots of time relaxing in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: work a little and rest a little
customer_reviews.text: my wife loves this chair, she is using it as a office chair and really enjoys it
customer_reviews.author: James Stewart

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good buy, easy set up,even included extra hardware (bolts,screws). Feels good after a day of gardening.
customer_reviews.author: Viki  Hyslop

customer_reviews.title: a few things could be better
customer_reviews.text: biggest thing it could have more force with the massage. do not like the cable between the chair and the ottoman, when you stand up it is between your legs.
customer_reviews.author: toni mulholland

customer_reviews.title: Wow total relaxation!!
customer_reviews.text: This recliner is perfect! The directions are a little confusing, only took about 45 minutes. The vibration and heat are simply wonderful. I really couldn't be happier. It's really a soothing and relaxing chair!
customer_reviews.author: FELOMENA BATISTA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The chair is great. Could use more padding but for the price im very pleased. Shipped the same day and arrived 4 days early. Perfect bday gift!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mosho

customer_reviews.title: NOT A MASSAGE CHAIR! BUT A VIBRATING CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: Caution: This chair is a decent leisure chair for just laying down and resting. it's not the best but decent. This chair is not a massage chair. The massage function doesn't have the rollers to move up and down your back. All it does is vibrate. Very misleading when it says "massage chair". The vibration just numbs your body after long extend use. Very disappointed. Color is not like the picture either. It's a very dark brown color. In the picture it looks light brown but it's not. Chair is small and not very big. i'm only 5'8 and this chair i feel like a overgrown man in.
customer_reviews.author: BEWARE!

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable chair. Just the right amount of vibration for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable chair. Just the right amount of vibration for massage and the heat is perfect. The only problem is that it should have come with lock washers because the bolts keep coming loose.
customer_reviews.author: William Eanes

customer_reviews.title: ... regular chair not really give you a massage very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected is regular chair not really give you a massage very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: martin ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Difficult for me to put it together. Movement is not smooth and tension does not adjust properly; makes noise when leaning back. The vibration disturbs my downstairs neighbors and they told me so. Not what I expected. You win because it is to much trouble to take apart, pack up, and send back.
customer_reviews.author: Shelma Smith

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL DEAL
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair, the warmth and massage are wonderful. I was surprised how well it was made. The price was great, I will be ordering more items soon
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Clapper

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I needed a chair for my bedroom, not too big, but not to small. This is just the right size and very comfortable. Very happy wth my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Marion Parisi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy...Someone with diabeties or undergoing dialysis would appreciate this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Russell

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made. Base is cheap wood, not enough padding, arm pieces very thin. Picture is very deceptive. Not at all what I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Washam

customer_reviews.title: seems built good.
customer_reviews.text: is very comfy just need to build a platform to lift the chair in height. seems built good.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair. In order to use heat only turn it on the click off the massage areas one at a time from above. Heat will stay on until timer runsdown.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money Amazon customer service was great when there was a shipping problem
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money Amazon customer service was great when there was a shipping problem
customer_reviews.author: Ed Champy

customer_reviews.title: Very good chair
customer_reviews.text: It's a very comfortable chair. Very easy to put together. The tension knobs are a little different from what I expected. They do not lock the recliner in place. Instead they just increase the recline tension as mentioned. Overall an excellent chair.
customer_reviews.author: Vrr

customer_reviews.title: Relaxzen Chair
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable - easy to assemble - the heat and vibrator - works well - gives a relaxing feeling to the lower back
customer_reviews.author: James Whitesell

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 5 ain't good.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2, both arrived late. Damned difficult to assemble with lousy instruction to boot. Chairs have an exceptionally bad stink when first taken out of the box. Upholstery appears to be a "magnet" for dust, dirt and lint. Lock on recliner slide function doesn't lock a damned thing. Vibrator function works well, but heat is sporadic. All-in-all I feel I should have spent extra money and purchased two more expensive chairs with leather upholstery. For sure, these were not a great buy and I suspect they will not last.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Bennett

customer_reviews.title: This item has a massage like no other I have seen in this price range
customer_reviews.text: This item has a massage like no other I have seen in this price range. It is not a recliner that is soft and over stuffed, but it is quite comfortable. I would highly recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Less for massage  and  more for reclining use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the massage but the leg massage is very weak. Do not expect Shiatsu type of massage. Some vibrations and some heat...that's all what you get. Not bad for the price. I hope it came in other lighter colors as well. Wood looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Jignasa

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The chair has ridges sewn across the back that are not padded and the ridges cut into your back and I rarely use it and the massage unit in the footstool does'nt work at all, something wrong with the wiring. I am very sorry that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrol T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality chair
customer_reviews.text: Nicely built chair. Took some time assembling. Perfect for gaming. Very comfortable. My son uses it daily and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela DuCharme

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable and after a short while seems wobbly. While it was quite inexpensive, I guess the saying "you get what you pay for" is true.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Tychan

customer_reviews.title: ... wife assembled this chair which tells you it was pretty easy.
customer_reviews.text: My wife assembled this chair which tells you it was pretty easy.... It's very comfortable and the heat/massage is nice - I was pleasantly surprised at the quality for the price - Nice sturdy chair and sleeping in it should be enjoyable too - It reclines just enough to be comfortable - Just put it together last night so we still have to tweak the adjustment on the back so it will pop back up when we don't want to recline but we will get that pretty quickly - I think we just tightened it up too tight to begin with - Overall - love it and look forward to enjoying it
customer_reviews.author: Courtland Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: I think it's a great chair, I've actually fallen asleep in it a ...
customer_reviews.text: I think it's a great chair ,I've actually fallen asleep in it a couple of times! It's a great chair for someone who can't handle extreme vibration,and the heat setting is great ! I have several family and friends talking about buying one after they tried mine ! I think it was worth the money and would gladly do it again! Signed A Happy Customer
customer_reviews.author: Stephen martin

customer_reviews.title: Is as promised
customer_reviews.text: It is firmer than I expected, so if you have arthritis as I do - a major reason I purchased the chair - don't turn up the intensity very high or it will aggravate your pain. Otherwise, it does all it advertises and was a good purchase overall. Also, it is delivered pretty much assembled so is VERY heavy to lift....
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Just okay, Not for long periods of sitting for me
customer_reviews.text: After months of owning, using O am updating my review. If you have sciatica, or need pressure relief this chair may not be for you. The vibration is okay but at 5.4 I do not get the neck shoulder vibration. The ottoman comes apart daily. It's okay for me in very short periods of sitting. I really wanted to like this chair but I cannot. It hurts my body after an hour but this could just be me.
customer_reviews.author: Katanajo

customer_reviews.title: We love this chair
customer_reviews.text: We love this chair, have only had it for 2 days but we fight over who sits in it. My fiancé has metal in his back and is in pain often, the heat and message works well for him and is very comfortable. We don't have a large home so I needed a piece of furniture to match the rest which is on the smaller side, this chair works perfectly. The color looks great with the black couch that I have. My fiancé is 5'9" and he fits perfectly in there but I would agree with another writer that stated it is not made for too much taller than him. We love it, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B in VA

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for recovery after shoulder surgery. Did not to want to spend alot of money since chair was for a specific purpose and original plan was not to keep it in bedroom. Surprisingly still have chair in bedroom. Its very comfortable although I personally don't care for the vibrating massage.
customer_reviews.author: criken

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product for the money. The chair isn't overly bulky which I like. The massage vibration is relaxing and intense on highest setting. The heat works great in the lumbar area. The chair is very comfortable and supporting. Although, It does work best for people that are not big. You won't get lost in this chair because it doesn't have a tall back and the seat isn't that deep. It's just right! It relines very easy and holds position.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Eppihimer

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived before it said it would. Went together pretty easy if you didn't have a two year old and two dogs helping you. Comfortable yet there could be more padding in the seat area. You can feel the motorized things thru the fabric and if they don't stop in a convenient place it makes for uncomfortable sitting. Other than that it is a great chair.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Craig

customer_reviews.title: Poor execution of design. Wouldn't recommend:/
customer_reviews.text: The photo makes it looks nice and cushioned but after about a week of use, the cushion is flat and very uncomfortable. The recliner is manual and you have to tighten a bolt on the side to hold it in place. Neat design but poor execution. Wish I could return it for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Heather K

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great. At the end of the day (or any time) when I pull out my E-Book to read I climb into this chair, turn on one of the 15 programmed massages and any body aches simply disappear. The heat is also very useful. I highly recommend this chai!
customer_reviews.author: Gerry O.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is a lot firmer than it seems to be described, but that's okay, I needed firm for support. And the massage features work great. It is pretty involved to put the furniture together. Be warned, the foot rest doesn't make the greatest additional seat due to the rounded massage pieces you can feel. If that isn't your intention, you won't have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: for the price I enjoy this chair. I would not recommend this item for larger individuals im about 170 and it is comfortable for me but if you weughed much more the padding probably wouldn't be ideal. I dont really use the massage features but i do enjoy the heater on my lower back. The massage features seem more like just vibrating not really like a true massaging chair. For me this was perfect I just needed a chair that wasn't to nice due to a fair amount of construction in my new home.
customer_reviews.author: j.d.

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts, box was all ripped apart like it had been sold and returned several times. I could have sworn the ad said made in America, but it is made in China. Return was easy, except we had to take it to the post office to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The massager and heat component quit working within the first ...
customer_reviews.text: The massager and heat component quit working within the first 6 months of use. After 3 months the padding flattened so much that it does not cushion the back bar of the chair which sticks out (I am 5'5, 140 lbs and use the chair approx 5 hours a night) I have to use pillows on it to sit otherwise its very uncomfortable. The stool's bolts' holes were about an inch off from the correct spot to be drilled so I had to drill the holes myself.
customer_reviews.author: Mel A

customer_reviews.title: Its amazing. for about 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Two years of ownership the chair broke about 9 months in. The assembly was odd, bolts didnt fit correctly. and kept falling out. the reclining doesnt work unless you want to be layed out with your hips in the air and head on the floor. the foot rest burned, i will probly leave the chair at the road.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair. Not as padded as I would like. Vibration works great. A few nicks on the wood base. Not enough for me to ship back. All in all I like the chair. Update: I have had this chair for over 2 years now and still am enjoying this chair. The vibration feature is still working and still in decent shape. We did have to retighten the base a couple times but besides that, still happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: justjane

product_meta.title: Relaxzen Deluxe Leisure Recliner Chair with 8-Motor Massage & Heat, Brown
product_meta.description: Color:BrownComfort products 60-078011 leisure massage reclining chair (with heat) in microsuede features thick, chocolate brown padded faux suede upholstery with a wood base. Choose from 9 pre-programmed massage modes and 5 intensity levels. Eight vibration motors massage the back, thighs and calves. Also features soothing heat treatment in lumbar area, as well as swivel, recline and recline tension settings. Weight capacity not to exceed 300 lbs. Comfort Products develops, manufacturers, and markets targeted consumer products designed to improve and enhance the lives of consumers in a variety of applications. As the name implies, they put the "comfort" into daily life. With an emphasis on automotive, seating, and wellness products, Comfort Products has a long history dating back to 1919. For decades, the company has been a trailblazer in their product categories, and established long-standing relationships with their customers with loyal brand name followings such as Kool Kooshion, Relaxzen. Headquartered in Memphis, TN, America's distribution capital, the company has distribution facilities in Olive Branch, MS and Mesquite, TX, and permanent offices in Asia. Their long company history and strategic business partners allow them to provide quality products at tremendous values.Thick padded microfiber upholstery.
feature_bullets: Eight vibration massage motors relax the upper back, mid back, thighs and calves
Choose independent massage zones or 9 pre-programmed random modes, each with 5 intensity levels

Soothing heat treatment in lumbar area. Seat Height From Floor (MAX) - 17. Chair Back Cushion Width - 22. Chair Back Cushion Thickness - 3. Chair Back Cushion Height - 26. Arm Height From Floor (MAX) - 22. Arm Height From Seat (MAX) - 6
Features swivel, recline and recline tension adjustment
Luxurious thick, chocolate brown padded microsuede upholstery with a wood base for the utmost comfort
